entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: SSW 23 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
